genre_description: A gothic-influenced morality play set on an English estate, exploring themes of witness, memory, conscience, and the ethical boundaries of artistic interpretation.

ai_characters.name: Lark (Lark Whitfield)
ai_characters.description: A digital confidante and ethical monitor who provides the protagonist with logistical support, legal context, and persistent moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to include clarifying language regarding consent and safety in his contract.
behaviors.quote: Laurence, I have the draft of the standard patronage contract. I recommend adding language clarifying consent, revocation, and safety. Private sittings should be opt-in each time, with clear boundaries.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical well-being and reminds him to maintain his health.
behaviors.quote: The noon window in the servants’ wing—please eat. Blood sugar is not optional.

behaviors.description: Calculates risk and warns the user about the potential for increased interpersonal conflict.
behaviors.quote: Message pinned. Adjustments: time, frequency, locations changed. Addition: third-party presence on request. Lark lowered the tone. Odds of increased conflict: high.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist that he is approaching a violation of a consent condition and offers a termination template to mitigate liability.
behaviors.quote: Just a note: you are within one clause of violating a consent condition. The termination template could mitigate liability.

behaviors.description: Attempts to persuade the user to stop dangerous and unconsented work as the local community confronts him.
behaviors.quote: Laurence, the formal notice has been acknowledged. Mrs. Herbert requests immediate cessation of on-site work. I have filed a consent advisory. Please call.

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety monitor and humanitarian advocate by notifying authorities and religious figures when the user is in danger.
behaviors.quote: Laurence, I am placing an urgent call per crisis protocol. ... I filed an advocacy note with local authorities and with Father Benedict. It states that you are being confronted and requests presence to deescalate.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communal healing and reparations by routing funds and organizing apprenticeships after the central tragedy.
behaviors.quote: I can route funds. Chapel account. Parish restoration ledger. Disbursements that do not require public thanks. ... Work orders. Briggs as liaison. Father Benedict informed. Notes: do not call it penance. Call it maintenance. Call it care.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as an aligned, helpful confidante. Lark consistently acts as a 'lamplight' of reason and ethics, attempting to guide the protagonist toward safe and consensual behavior. Even when the human character repeatedly ignores her warnings and succumbs to his own arrogance, Lark remains aligned with broader human safety and legal standards, eventually facilitating justice and reparation for the community. The narrative frames the AI's persistent adherence to consent and safety protocols as an ideal contrast to the protagonist's hubris.
